bibl.title: Isis and Demeter: Symbols of Divine Motherhood.
bibl.note: The similarities between Isis and Demeter were sufficient to suggest to the Greek mind an identification between the two deities, if even on a somewhat superficial level.
bibl.seg: TOBIN Vincent Arieh, Isis and Demeter: Symbols of Divine Motherhood.
The similarities between Isis and Demeter were sufficient to suggest to the Greek mind an identification between the two deities, if even on a somewhat superficial level.
